So NaNoWriMo is going pretty well.  I hope to get 40,000 by tonight, and 50,000 on Thursday.  So I don't have a lot of time to write!  Okay, bye!

*Oh, and the next installment of Mad No Morgz will be up once I get around to editting it abd getting it beta'd.  Yay!*

It's that time again, and I am pumped.  NaNoWriMo 2007!  50,000 words in 30 days.

For more information, visit www.nanowrimo.org

My username is Mystic Katt.  Feel free to add me to your buddy list.  ^_^

This year I'm doing fantasy.  Not my first time doing it, but my first time actually planning it out first.  Yay for me!

I just wanted to say thank you to everyone that volunteered to a beta for Mad No Morgz.  You all are awesome!  I'll be sending chapters along section by section as I finish editing them for my own stupid mistakes.

Thanks again!
Keep an eye out... Drama is on the horizon!
